meanings.sent1: The angulous shape of the building made it stand out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The artist used angulous lines to create a modern and edgy design.
meanings.sent3: The angulous table looked like it belonged in a puzzle rather than a dining room.
meanings.sent4: Her angulous personality clashed with his easygoing nature.
meanings.sent5: The angulous cliffs jutted out dramatically against the sky.

meanings.definition: Characterized by sharp angles or corners.
meanings.sent1: The angulous rocks along the path made it difficult to navigate.
meanings.sent2: The angulous edges of the sculpture reflected the artist's precision.
meanings.sent3: The angulous shadows cast by the streetlights created a mysterious atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: His angulous features gave him a stern and serious appearance.
meanings.sent5: The angulous rooftops of the old town contrasted with the smooth curves of the new buildings.
